name: Unlocker
desc: Unlocker prevents your device from locking when you shut the screen off. Useful for when you don't want to type your password.

changelog.changes:
- Improve the lock check on the CC module. Thanks to [@iCraze](https://twitter.com/iCrazeiOS).
  - Now works if device is unlocked but on lock screen
  - Now shows an error message instead of just trying to unlock the device.
